EVENT NAME: We Play - Barcelona's Festival of Playful Digital Installations
EVENT DESCRIPTION:
After We Code, We Make and We Draw, MOB is coming back with a new event made-in-MOB, We Play!
On September 29th, let us get you a glimpse of fun from the future!

With highly immersive and interactive digital exhibition, We Play will bring you the finest creative works of Barcelona‚Äôs artists and makers in the field of gaming and digital technology! This is your chance to playfully experience some unique and futuristic arts, games and entertainment.

Technophile or not, professional or non-professional, family and group of friends can partake in talks, workshops, interactive exhibitions and more. Also, watch as we unfold an exciting challenge at the Game Jam - to build your own game! You are invited to discover the inventive movement of Playful Digital Arts!

This 29th of September, from 10:00 AM to 07:00 PM, join us at We Play which will take place at the freshly renovated Sant Antoni Market.

For more information, you may contact us at weplay@mob-barcelona.com


- FREE EVENT -


>The EXHIBITORS

>> uGIF Xpress HACKatON by @Warks and @Lab4Reality
uGIF Xpress HACKatON is an experience of creation of an express interactive experience where each one of the 100 participants will create a GIF inspired by its himself. The GIFs will then be projected in the store Ara√±a in Raval, to be part of its first collaborative digital exhibition. Among all the GIFs created, a design will then be chosen to be decomposed in two pictures and printed a white tee shirts. This tee shirt will be the first piece of clothes created from a digital work, and it will be on sale in the store Ara√±a, calle Riera Baixa 5.

weplay.mob-barcelona.com - #WePlayFest

>> People You May Know by Jake Pyne
An installation that looks for moments of similarity between strangers in the same space

>> Escape from monochrome by Waldemar RAmos
Discover an augmented reality fantasy world

>> One Last Beat by H√©ctor Monerris
A homemade interactive short film that explores the purpose of life in a funny and reckless way

>> Chachi by Chachi App
Try to catch Chachi and win a month membership at MOB

>> Random Virgin Generator by Zinkete
With your keyboard, send prayers to digital gods

++++ Many more to be revealed.


Find all the details of We Play‚Äôs schedule on weplay.mob-barcelona.com


> WORKSHOPS
Game Jam by Barcelona Activa
September 25th, 26th, 27th, 28th @Barcelona Activa
In team and with the help of mentors, develop a functioning interactive installation in just four days.

Introductory Workshop by @Playabit and imaginCaf√©
September 29th, 4-6pm imaginCaf√©
Toni Jau from Playabit will show you how to create a digital interactive installation, with no previous experience in coding.



Event organised by:
MOB, a creative hub bringing in two coworking spaces a community of 300+ talents

EVENT NAME: Paint & Drinks - Street ART with SecleStyle
EVENT DESCRIPTION:
WHERE: Zangamanga cafe&bar
WHEN: 18.09.2018 | 19:30 ‚Äì 22:00
TICKET: 25‚Ç¨ per person | Tickets must be booked through our website www.artnightout.es

STREET ART:
This time Art Night Out will get a touch of street art, where our artist SecleStyle will share with us her passion about street art and her most popular motifs.


ABOUT ART NIGHT OUT:
Art Night Out is the art experience for everyone where you paint with friends and meet new people in a two-hour painting session. Professional local artists show you step-by-step how to paint your own piece of art that you take home in the end of the night.

As the events take place at popular bars and restaurants in the city you can enjoy a drink or two, while being creative. We take care of all the painting equipment, so you do not need to bring anything to the event.

The event will be held in English, however our artists also speak Spanish.

There are a few things to keep in mind when participating in our events
---As we start in time, please be at the venue 10-15 mins prior to the set starting time, so you have enough time make yourself comfortable and order something to drink.
---Drinks and food are not included in the ticket price. However, you can order them during the event at the usual prices.
---Tickets need to be booked through our website before the event in order to have access. Please have the booking confirmation available just in case (on your phone is enough).
---Minimum age: 18 years



ARTIST: SECLE STYLE (Street Artist)
Instagram: www.instagram.com/elisa__battiston/
Facebook: www.facebook.com/Seclestyle

TICKETS NEED TO BE BOOKED THROUGH OUR WEBSITE :)


LOCATION: ZANGAMANGA cafe&bar
Zangamanga is an excellent place for music lovers, combining fine tunes with chilled drinks. The bar was opened last year by the owner Rafael and is a great venue to listen to fantastic musicians play jazz, blues, rock&roll, reggae, etc.

Do you have any questions regarding the event? Feel free to write us an email: info@artnightout.es

EVENT NAME: MODA Y LUJO EN LA CORTE DE LOS FARAONES DEL ANTIGUO EGIPTO
EVENT DESCRIPTION:
La idea que ten√≠an los antiguos egipcios de la belleza nos es patente gracias a las esculturas y las pinturas, pero tambi√©n a las joyas y a los ornamentos que se han hallado. Los habitantes del valle del Nilo rend√≠an culto a la belleza, cuidaban su higiene y su apariencia personal con extrema coqueter√≠a. Su finalidad era alcanzar la eternidad, la eterna juventud.

#ObjecteBCN √©s un cicle de 4 sessions per descobrir i donar a con√®ixer nou talent emergent en l‚Äôart aplicat als objectes.
Us proposem un recorregut a trav√©s de la vida del producte de disseny o artesanal, explicat en primera persona pels seus creadors. Descobrirem l‚Äôevoluci√≥ de la creaci√≥ de l‚Äôobjecte, com i on es creen i la seva posada en escena a la botiga d‚Äôun museu.

Seg√ºent sessi√≥: dimecres 24 d‚Äôoctubre ‚Äì art t√®xtil

(Foto: obra de Raquel Bistuer)

Amadeo Gabino, artista que en un principi part√≠ de l‚Äôexploraci√≥ i imitaci√≥ del natural, va saber crear un univers de dures i arestes formes met√†l‚Ä¢liques, de llises i impenetrables superf√≠cies, de rugosos i polits plans, de profunds buits que a manera d‚Äôesvorancs, ulls o cr√†ters volc√†nics fan aflorar el misteri de la seva erupci√≥.

Les escultures d‚ÄôAmadeo Gabino, compostes de capes met√†l‚Ä¢liques superposades, igual que la closca que protegeix les parts toves del cos d‚Äôalguns insectes, o les capes tendres i suculentes d‚Äôun bulb vegetal, adquireixen un valor d‚Äôembolcall i hermetisme abans insospitat.
Escuts, elms, armadures, esteles i vibracions, un m√≥n pl√†stic que es dre√ßa davant nostre a la manera d‚Äôun enigma, d‚Äôun emblema.

A l‚Äôexposici√≥ Amadeo Gabino ‚ÄúRevisted‚Äù, que s‚Äôinaugurar√† per a l‚Äôesdeveniment Barcelona Gallery Weeknd, presentarem 18 peces, entre les quals 8 collages, escuts, i divereses escultures, algunes d‚Äôelles en gran format, fent una revisi√≥ de tota la seva traject√≤ria art√≠stica.

~~~~~~~~~~~~

Amadeo Gabino, artista que en un principio parti√≥ de la exploraci√≥n e imitaci√≥n de lo natural, supo crear un universo de duras y aristas formas met√°licas, de lisas e impenetrables superficies, de rugosos y pulidos planos, de profundas oquedades que a manera de boquetes, ojos o cr√°teres volc√°nicos hacen aflorar el misterio de su erupci√≥n.

Las esculturas de Amadeo Gabino, compuestas de capas met√°licas superpuestas, al igual del caparaz√≥n que protege las partes blandas del cuerpo de algunos insectos, o las capas tiernas y jugosas de un bulbo vegetal, adquieren un valor de envoltura y hermetismo antes insospechado.
Escudos, yelmos, armaduras, estelas y vibraciones, un mundo pl√°stico que se yergue ante nosotros a manera de un enigma, de un emblema.

En la exposici√≥n Amadeo Gabino ‚ÄúRevisited‚Äù, que se inaugurar√° para el evento Barcelona Gallery Weekend, presentaremos 18 piezas, entre las cuales 8 collages, escudos, y varias esculturas, algunas de ellas en gran formato, haciendo una revisi√≥n de toda su trayectoria art√≠stica.

------------------
Con esta pintura titulada Ausencias (160x130cm), presento parte de la serie Norte en Barcelona en el Hotel Eurostars Bcn Design 5 * (Paseo de Gracia 29-31). Exposici√≥n abierta hasta el 4 de Noviembre.
NORD /NORTH es un proyecto art√≠stico en el que llevo tiempo investigando t√©cnicamente, formal y conceptualmente hablando y que me sirve de motivo espec√≠fico para continuar profundizando en un proceso de creaci√≥n entre la pintura y el grabado. Un di√°logo a veces muy dif√≠cil de delimitar en mi obra, donde se une, se separa y confluye igual que las ideas y las emociones al expresarse de manera intuitiva.
Me muevo por inquietudes formales, crom√°ticas, textuales sin palabras... por emociones. Quiero interpretar algo que he vivido o que he sentido, en algo que pasa del figurativo al abstracto casi sin darte cuenta. Esto ocurre en el PAISAJE NATURAL, y muy espec√≠ficamente en las PIEDRAS Y ROCAS de la costa norte de Menorca y que podr√≠a ocurrir en muchos otros Nortes, a los que interpreto en esta obra titulada NORD NORTH.
Nacido y vivido durante muchos a√±os en Menorca hace que gran parte de las ra√≠ces y la inspiraci√≥n de mi trabajo art√≠stico gire alrededor del mar y del paisaje costero. Ya bien sea por interpretar la excelencia de la riqueza geol√≥gica, animal y paisaj√≠stica mar√≠tima (como ocurre en la serie NORD NORTH) o bien como denuncia medioambiental (proyecto ZAPATOS n√°ufragos y MASKS).
T√©cnicas: Pintura mixta sobre tela, Obra gr√°fica realizada en grabado sobre papel, sobre madera (obras √∫nicas) y Escultura (Madera encontrada en la orilla del mar).
A√±o de realizaci√≥n: 2017 y 2018
---------------------
With this painting entitled Absences (160x130cm), I present part of the North series in Barcelona at the Eurostars Bcn Design 5 * Hotel (Paseo de Gracia 29-31). Exhibition open until November 4.
NORD / NORTH is an artistic project in which I have spent time researching technically, formally and conceptually speaking and which serves as a specific reason to continue deepening a process of creation between painting and printmaking. A dialogue sometimes very difficult to define in my work, where it joins, separates and converges as well as ideas and emotions when expressed intuitively.
I move for formal, chromatic, textual concerns without words ... for emotions. I want to interpret something that I have lived or felt, something that goes from figurative to abstract almost without realizing it. This occurs in the NATURAL LANDSCAPE, and very specifically in the STONES AND ROCKS of the north coast of Menorca and that could occur in many other Nortes, which I interpret in this work entitled NORD NORTH.
Born and lived for many years in Menorca, a lot of the roots and inspiration of my artistic work revolve around the sea and the coastal landscape. Either by interpreting the excellence of the geological, animal and maritime landscape wealth (as in the NORD NORTH series) or as an environmental complaint (ZAPATOS n√°ufragos y MASKS project).
Techniques: Mixed painting on canvas, Graphic work made in engraving on paper, on wood (unique works) and Sculpture (Wood found on the seashore).
Year of completion: 2017 and 2018
